property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an enchantment: Auratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The auratog enjoys eating its wards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lands you control are Plains. Nonland permanents you control are white. The same is true for spells you control and nonland cards you own that aren't on the battlefield. You may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has indestructible and can't be enchanted by other Auras.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Defiant Vanguard blocks, at end of combat, destroy it and all creatures it blocked this turn. {5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with mana value 4 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play with your hand revealed. If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card. Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Sliver deals damage, its controller gains that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The slivers would survive, even at the expense of every other creature on Otaria.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to any target this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a red source is prevented this way, Honorable Passage deals that much damage to the source's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Icatian Javelineers enters the battlefield with a javelin counter on it. {T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Members of the elite Moorish Cavalry are very particular about their mounts, choosing only those whose bloodlines have been pure for generations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus. {1}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not go there, do not go / unless you rise on wings, unless you walk on hooves." - "Song to the Sun," Femeref song

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from red Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In Rath," the priest said, "there is even greater need for prayer."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of twenty yeer of age he was, I gesse. Of his stature he was of evene lengthe. And wonderly delyvere, and of greete strengthe." - Geoffrey Chaucer, The Canterbury Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike As long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a Plains, creatures you control have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cracks widened, the shell crumbled, and Valor spread throughout the land." - Scroll of Beginnings

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Witch Hunter deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. {1}{W}{W}, {T}: Return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground." - Sidar Jabari

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dandân can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Dandân.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Catch good today. Start replacing crew tomorrow." - Faysal al-Mousa, fisher captain, log

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saffiyah clapped her hands and twenty flying men appeared at her side, each well trained in the art of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That phantom prow split the storm as lightning cast its long shadow on the battlefield below." - Mireille Gaetane, The Valeriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose not to untap Giant Oyster during your untap step. {T}: For as long as Giant Oyster remains tapped, target tapped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step, and at the beginning of each of your draw steps, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature. When Giant Oyster leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, remove all -1/-1 counters from the creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Leviathan enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan. Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mistform Ultimus is every creature type (even if this card isn't on the battlefield).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It may wear your face, but its mind is its own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ovinomancer enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return three basic lands you control to their owner's hand. {T}, Return Ovinomancer to its owner's hand: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 0/1 green Sheep creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pirate Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {T}: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to any target. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Pirate Ship.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Occasionally, members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Psionic Blast deals 4 damage to any target and 2 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying White spells and black spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each Stormscape apprentice must hand-raise and train an owl before attaining the rank of master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}{U}, Sacrifice a Wizard: Counter target spell. Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.value: Buyback {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, this spell costs {6} less to cast. Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Conspiracy enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control are the chosen type. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules

property.value: "If I must die, I will encounter darkness as a bride, / And hug it in mine arms." - William Shakespeare, Measure for Measure

property.value: Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack. Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore can't be blocked except by Walls.

property.value: The highway of fear is the shortest route to defeat.

property.value: When Faceless Butcher enters the battlefield, exile another target creature. When Faceless Butcher leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target player discards a card. • Target creature gets +2/-1 until end of turn. • Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.value: When Sengir Autocrat enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens. When Sengir Autocrat leaves the battlefield, exile all Serf tokens.

property.value: There are medicines for all afflictions but idleness. - Suq'Ata saying

As long as Gaea's Liege is attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests defending player controls. {T}: Target land becomes a Forest until Gaea's Liege leaves the battlefield.

property.value: When the Brotherhood of Gix dug out the cave of Koilos they found their master's severed hand. They enshrined it, hoping that one day it would point the way to Phyrexia.

property.value: Feldon found the first of these canes frozen in the Ronom Glacier.

property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles.
